comments: Great teacher. Final optional if you are happy with your grade. Very easygoing and personable. Teaches various psych and statistics courses at ASU also. Definitely recommend Dr Lewis for anything stats related.

Dr. Lewis is cool. Take into account that we\'re talking about statistics here. Not an exciting topic, and not easy. read the chapters, walk into class confused, but you\'ll understand by the time you walk out. He\'ll explain things over and over again until you understand, but you have to speak up.
Dr. Lewis is super cool! Do the work--get the appropriate grade. The final is optional. I definitely recommend this class!
Avoid this instructor. He\'s rude, rude, rude, doesn\'t care whether or not anyone understands, thinks he\'s better than everyone.
